author: bringatrailer
title: Collection of Ferrari Literature at No Reserve
text:
Collection of Ferrari Literature
[0Comments](#comments-anchor)
BaT Essentials
Garage44 West Annville, Pennsylvania 17003
- Collection of 292 Pieces of Literature
- Printed in English and Italian
- 56 Hardcover & Softcover Books
- Cavallino Magazine Issues 1-235
- Palm Beach Cavallino Classic Program
- Wood Holders
GET THE BaT DAILY EMAIL
Your daily digest of everything
happening on the site.
Recent BaT Features [More features](#) [View All Features](/features/)
Current BaT Auctions
This collection of Ferrari books and magazines was collected by the owner over several decades and includes 292 items in total. The books present marque history, production information, and analysis of individual models, while some compile individual features in various publications. Issues of Cavallino magazine from 1978 to 2020 are also included and stored in wood holders. This collection is now offered by the seller on behalf of the owner at no reserve in Annville, Pennsylvania.
The 56 hardcover and softcover books are printed in English and Italian and include overviews of Ferrari company history, competition participation, and the development of individual models. The earliest publication dates to 1959, and spreadsheets listing the titles, authors, dimensions, and printing details are presented in the gallery.
Publication information for each book is shown in the gallery along with slipcovers, author signatures, and other notable features.
Several volumes compile Ferrari production numbers, manufacturerâ€™s literature, and media features.
Issues 1 through 235 of Cavallino magazine are included in the sale along with a program from the Palm Beach Cavallino Classic XV.
Eleven wood holders will accompany the magazines.
